step.context: \text{If I is disjoint from }\left[-1,1\right],\text{ then}\\ \text{what does that tell you?}
step.reason: \text{If I is disjoint from }\left[-1,1\right],\text{ then }\\ \text{they share no elements together. Mathematically,}\\ a\in I\implies a\notin\left[-1,1\right]

step.tex: \text{For }f(x)\text{ to be strictly increasing}\\ \begin{align} \dfrac{d}{dx}f(x)&=\dfrac{d}{dx}\left(x+\frac{1}{x}\right)\gt 0\\ \implies 1-\frac{1}{x^2}&\gt 0\implies\frac{1}{x^2}\gt 1\\ \implies x^2&\gt 1\implies (x-1)\cdot (x+1)\gt 0\\ \implies x\gt 1&\text{ or }x\lt -1\implies x\notin\left[-1,1\right] \end{align}
